https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Ee Bhargavi Nilayam movie tells lovers commit suicide. As a result the village has no rains for years and the festival in the temple never take place. It is predicted that a man will come across the river and save the village from their sufferings. Ee Bhargavi Nilayam
